channel.title: Hand Quilting Frames and Quilting Hoops

item.title: Swing Arm Lamp
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: Light up your wok area with the Swing Arm Lamp! It is compatible with the Grace Brite-white bulb to lessen eye strain and accurately portray colors.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• For the Z44 or Grace Hoop2
• Bulb sold separately

item.title: Start-Right Cloth Leaders
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: A time saving product to help you attach the fabric to your frame easily, and accurately. Includes three king size cloth leaders printed with precise guide marks and pin lines. Also includes a Velcro® attachment kit that can be used to secure the cloth leaders to your frame. Start-Right Cloth Leaders are also available by the yard. Call for details and know beforehand the sizes that you’ll want.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Cloth Leaders for machine or hand quilting frames

Choose the size that best fits your frame: 136", 124", or 112"

item.title: Start Right Cloth Leaders By the yard
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded:
A time saving product to help you attach your fabric to you frame easily, and accurately. Make your own custom leader cloth set or buy only what you need. Also available prepackaged or as a bolt.

Recieve three Cloth Leaders with every order!

Priced per yard. (ex: For ten yards, enter quantity of 10) Price includes three Cloth Leaders (one for each rail of the quilting frame.) To get a general idea of how long you need your leader cloth, measure the length of your quilting frame's rail and then subtract 6 inches.
item.excerpt:encoded: Cloth Leaders by the yard. For machine or hand quilting frames. Priced per yard. Enter the length you need in the Qty. above. You will recieve three Cloth Leaders of that length (one for each rail of the quilting frame. To get a general idea of how long you need your leader cloth, measure the length of your quilting frame's rail and then subtract 6 inches. Be sure to round up to the nearest yard. You can trim the Leaders down to a percise length to match your needs.

item.title: The Gracie Bee Quilting Frame
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: The Gracie Bee traditional-style quilting frame has many non-traditional innovations. Leg joints easily slide together for a snug and sturdy fit. Each leg rests on two separate feet, eliminating wobble. All parts fit together without the need for any extra tools to create a uniquely functional group quilting frame. When not in use, all of the pieces come together compactly for convenient storage or travel.
item.excerpt:encoded:
The Traditional style hand quilting frame done right:
  • Easy Assembly
  • Durable Rails
  • Metal Connectors
  • Elegant Design
  • Clamps Included
  • Breaks down for easy storage.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Gracie Bee hand quilting frame from the Grace Company

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I took a whroskop with Lyn Mann whose whroskop was all about using up ugly fabric. I hadn't the finished the project until I put it in my 2010 UFO Challenge List. It's done and in my quilter's queue. I had a slightly different arrangement more of a zig zag. The arrangements are endless with these blocks that do come out surprisingly appealing.
There is lot of similarity with the F22 in this deigsn. If this deigsn suits our requirements the best, then we should proceed without worrying too much about the reaction of the rest of the world.

item.title: Bright White Replacement Bulb
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: Low-heat bulb, so your project will not get extremely hot the longer you work on it.
item.excerpt:encoded: True color and low heat. Ideal for quilting

item.content:encoded: Two casters pre-assembled to each Z44 foot makes moving your Z44 almost effortless. Each caster is lockable to keep your frame stationary when quilting.

item.title: Poly Lap Hoop
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: The Grace Company Lap Hoops provide you with an easy and comfortable options for quilting. They are perfect for quilting groups, travel, and any place where there might not be much room. Get all the portability without losing functionality! The Lap Hoops offer absolute control with features like a rotating and tilting work area that can be locked in at any angle. You have the choice of a sturdy plastic or more traditional wood crafted hoop. Free edge tools included!
item.excerpt:encoded: • Adjustable outer hoop accommodates a variety of thicknesses • 14” diameter hoop • Rotates 360 degrees • Edge tools included for ideal fabric tension • Tilting work area can be locked at most comfortable angle

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I feel a bit silly admitting this, but for the last two years whevneer I see something cute for babies, I buy it. That way I now have a small collection of beautiful things for my child that is not even here yet (though hopefully will be soon). Your blanket (gray edge) should absolutely be in that collection, together with the Apple Papple print I already have from your shop!

Its like having your own prtivae photo journalist along with you! I feel such a pang of longing when I see the street outside the medical exam place, I always hate how places go on existing when I've left, I think it comes from not wanting to miss out on anything! Still good job for you it does exist when I'm not there! Looks like D is gradually getting more comfy and thank heaven for baby carriers!

item.title: EZ3 Adjustable Hand Quilting Frame
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded:
The EZ3 is a convenient, adjustable hand quilting frame. The three-rail, no-baste work area can tilt to four different angles. All adjustments can be made and locked in place without the need of any tools, just the knobs that come on the frame. The EZ3 also folds up for space-saving storage. Like the Z44, the EZ3 is a convenient, adjustable hand quilting frame. The three rail, no-baste work area can tilt to four different angles. All adjustments can be made and locked in place without the need of any tools, just the knobs that come on the frame. Highlights
  • Sets up in craft, crib, and queen size
  • Tilt adjustable work area (4 angles)
  • Folds for convenient storage
  • 30-tooth ratchets provide superior tension
The EZ3 also folds up for space-saving storage after use and can be set up in three size-Craft (32"), Crib (64") or Queen (96") size.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Start-Right EZ3

No-Baste Hand Quilting Frame

The EZ3 is a convenient, adjustable hand quilting frame. The three-rail, no-baste work area can tilt to four different angles. All adjustments can be made and locked in place without the need of any tools, just the knobs that come on the frame. The EZ3 also folds up for space-saving storage.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: [icoonbox category="65" layout="grid" columns="2" style="style2" border="enabled" bordercolor="#DCDCDC" borderstyle="solid" boxboxed="disabled" icontype="fontIcon" iconsize="iconsize_32" iconcolor="#f4726d" iconboxed="disabled" hovericoncolor="#ffffff" orderby="date" order="DESC" fontstyle="custom" titlefontcolor="#777777" titlefontsize="16px" titlefontweight="bold" textfontcolor="#777777" textfontsize="12px" morelink="disabled" hovereffect="effect5" hovertitlecolor="#f4726d" ]

a:1:{i:0;a:10:{s:13:"review_status";s:7:"publish";s:12:"review_title";s:36:"Grace Hand quilting frames are great";s:15:"review_template";s:26:"rwp_template_548f2db62ce66";s:13:"review_scores";a:3:{i:0;i:5;i:1;i:5;i:2;i:5;}s:27:"review_custom_overall_score";s:1:"5";s:11:"review_pros";s:35:"Very versatile and easy to put away";s:11:"review_cons";s:32:"having to put it away is not fun";s:12:"review_image";s:0:"";s:27:"reviews_disable_user_rating";s:2:"no";s:9:"review_id";i:0;}}

The Ez3 Quilting Frame

Have you been searching for a versatile, reasonably priced, and user-friendly quilting frame? If so, the Start-Right EZ3 from The Grace Company could be just what you've been dreaming of. Convenient and highly adjustable, the EZ3 quilting frame was designed with ease of use as a top priority. It is an ideal frame for both beginning and experienced quilters. Novices will appreciate its simple, straight forward operation, while veterans will appreciate how its streamlined workflow saves time and maximizes overall efficiency.

Forget About Basting

For many people new to using a quilting frame, basting is one of the hardest aspects of the process to get used to. Owners of the EZ3 quilting frame can forget all about this problem, though, as it uses a totally basting-free system. Three tough and durable aluminum rails in conjunction with precision ratchets make handling your fabric and maintaining proper tension exceedingly easy -- even for first-time users!

A Wealth of Options

With the EZ3 quilting frame, you can make three different sizes of quilts. So, whether you're in the mood for experimenting with a series of small, relatively quick-to-construct quilts or you're ready to begin work on your large-scale masterpiece, the EZ3 has you covered. The quilting frame's three sizes consist of craft (27 inches), crib (59 inches), and queen (91 inches.)

A Comfortable Workspace

Quilting is a time-consuming hobby. Once you begin a new project, you'll spend many hours working on it before it is finally complete. It is essential, both for your enjoyment and for doing your best work, to be comfortable while quilting. The EZ3 can accommodate people of nearly every size and shape. The quilting frame's work space can tilt from zero to forty degrees. This makes it easy to find the angle that works best for you.

Key Features

  • Supports craft, crib, and queen size projects
  • 30-tooth ratchets for strong, consistent tension
  • Folds up for easy storage. Can be kept in a closet, up against the wall, or in other small spaces. It can even be folded with a project still in place!
  • Work area can be adjusted to four different angles for customized comfort and convenience
  • Frame Dimensions: 30 inches x 23 inches x 35 -- 99 inches (depending on selected project size)
  • Work Area Dimensions: 27 inches (craft), 59 inches (crib), 91 inches (queen)

Straight-line quilting is the easiest form of machine quilting. The results are always good, and it's quick, too!

Begin by inserting an even-feed presser foot in your machine, as shown in Figure 2. These presser feet are also known as walking feet. If your machine did not come with an even-feed foot, make a trip to the sewing center to get one. Bring your machine's manual with you so the clerk can help you find the right foot for your model.

item.title: Z44 Hand Quilting Frame
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded:
The Z44 is our top of the line hand quilting frame, as well as the most adjustable frame on the market. You can set the included height-adjustable legs to your level without the need of any tools! The work area also tilts to six different angles, letting you work in comfort. The Z44 is also durable and designed to withstand heavy use. Made with a beautifully crafted Baltic Birch wood, this is yet another way Grace quilting frames combine style and functionality.
Highlights
  • Sets up in crib, twin, queen and king sizes
  • Tilt adjustable work area (6 angles)
  • Folds for convenient storage
  • 50-tooth ratchets provide superior tension
item.excerpt:encoded:
The Z44 No-Baste Hand Quilting Frame

The Z44 is our top of the line hand quilting frame, as well as the most adjustable frame on the market. You can set the included height-adjustable legs to your level without the need of any tools! The work area also tilts to six different angles, letting you work in comfort.

item.title: Bungee Clamps
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: The Bungee Clamps provide excellent and even side tension for your quilts at the edges of your machine or hand quilting frame. Some frames come standard with them, so you will want to check the frame’s features to see if they are included. These come in a set of four. • Newly designed with slimmer profile and easy removal button! • Better side tension for your machine OR hand quilting frame.
item.excerpt:encoded: The Bungee Clamps provide excellent and even side tension for your quilts at the edges of your machine or hand quilting frame. Some frames come standard with them, so you will want to check the frame’s features to see if they are included. These come in a set of four.

Awesome blog! Do you have any helpful hints for aiiprsng writers? I'm hoping to start my own site soon but I'm a little lost on everything. Would you advise starting with a free platform like WordPress or go for a paid option? There are so many options out there that I'm totally confused .. Any tips? Appreciate it!

Definintely!I think doing 2 or 3 heavy days with 2 light days where you focus on technique and kpeeing the body moving works AMAZING for masters lifters.I almost feel like the light days do you as much good as the heavy days, honestly. There is the combo of getting blood flowing and increasing recovery active recovery is MUCH better than rest in almost every case and also the added CNS learning that you get from everyday going through the motions kind of practice.My Masters lifters who train this way make the fastest progress by a lot.The key is really just being smart about not going crazy everytime you hit the gym. Keep the light days light, and you can do almost as many of those as you want as they actually increase you capacity to recover.

item.title: The Grace Hoop2
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: The Grace Hoop 2. Square quilts should be quilted on a square hoop. The Grace Hoop2 is the foremost of a great line of square hoops designed to make hoop quilting easier. The square weave in fabric lends itself naturally to these hoops, achieving a better even tension on all sides. Designed with your comfort in mind, the Grace Hoop2 can adjust in height and angle to match your work-style. Shown in optional stain finish
item.excerpt:encoded:
• Square hoop for better even fabric tension
  • Comes with either a 24", 18" or 14" hoop
  • Included thread and scissor holders
  • Height adjustable
  • Tilt adjustable work area

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Grace Hoop2 - Square quilts should be quilted on a square hoop. The Grace Hoop 2 is the foremost line of square hoops designed to make hoop quilting easier.

Grace Hoop2 Features

I love this frame and direct everyone to your company! I recently started needle felting with wool, and this is the easiest frame to work with. The adjustability of this frame for height and angle is superb! It is perfect for any hand needlework that you think of. With a simple added rubber gripping fabric to the inner frame to keep your single layer material from slipping I can work needle felting, crazy quilting, needle point, etc. See my work on the frame at https://www.facebook.com/BetsyPriesingNF/

I just realized that mtesars was a pseudonym for old , which means me since I turn 53 in Dec.I enjoyed the video. I agree with you. I think people my age are more resilient then we give ourselves credit for.I train virtually everyday and frequently twice a day, and have had no problem every since I started weightlifting 20 months ago.My normal workout is 6-8 sets of either snatches or cleans at 85% -95% of my 1 rep max (the max I ever hit once) with 5 pullups and 5 pushups (hands at waist) in between each set. Twice a week I do heavy traditional weightlifting. Few months back I did a modified version of your squat nemesis and got my squat up from 115 to 150 (I weigh 125). I squated every day doing 4 waves of 3, 2, 1 where 1 was my 1RM. I pushed it, trying to jump my 1RM by 5# every day.. Frequently, I'd dump the bar, but every few days I would set a new max. I do everything this way, always pushing the envelope. I don't know if it is because of my young training age or if it is my willingness to push to failure, but I have made amazing gains following your training philosophy.Carol

item.title: Sidekick Table
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded: The Side-Kick easily attaches to the side of your frame to instantly increase your work-space area. It is at the perfect spot to hold all kinds of accessories needed for quilting. The Sidekick is also the perfect accessory when using QuiltMotion™ and you need a place for your laptop. (Compatible with the following frames- Majestic, Pinnacle, Mini Pinni, GMQ-Pro, Little Gracie II, Imperial, and Bernina Machine Quilting Frames).
item.excerpt:encoded: Easy to attach, constructed with durable birch plywood

item.title: Didi Lap Hoop
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded:
Get The Didi Lap Hoop. Get up close and personal with your projects with this convenient lap hoop. The diameter of the hoop is 14 inches and good for a variety of projects.This hoop is a favorite of Diedra McElroy of Roxanne International. Its unique square shape is better than round hoops for holding the tension in the square weave of fabrics.
  • Square hoop design for superior fabric holding
  • 14 inch diameter hoop
  • Adjustable outer hoop for various fabric thicknesses
  • Edge tools included for even tension all the way to the edges of your project
[caption id="attachment_552" align="alignright" width="200"] A favorite of Diedra McElroy[/caption]

item.title: Start Right Quilt Clips
item.dc:creator: phillipmadsen
item.content:encoded:
Designed for a new level of ease in machine quilting on a frame, Start-Right Quilt Clips let you make quick adjustments, so your fabric will always be straight and have perfect tension.
Quilt Clips make "floating" your quilt easier too! use the Quilt Clips to attach your fabric to your quilting frame with less pinning.
The Quilt Clips slide over your fabric and frame rail, keeping the quilt layers together. They expand to adjust to thickly rolled fabric and work for frames with rolling rails up to approximately 1½ inches in diameter.
Each package includes four Quilt Clips, each 24 inches long.
item.excerpt:encoded: Start-Right™ Quilt Clips are the fastest and easiest way to attach your fabric to your quilting frame. Quilt make make are designed for the easiest fabric adjustments and control.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Very good information in the cenommt above.I just wanted to tell you that I have ordered from Connecting Threads online for several years and have never been disappointed. I usually try to choose a fabric which has a light colored background so that my stitching mistakes will not be too visible. I've not had a quilt quilted professionally and in that case, the background would not be a problem. I also try to choose something that does not distract from the top which is the showpiece. For this quilt I chose a solid gold fabric for the back and am leaning toward a darker gold print for the binding.Mama Bear

This is what I do- I ask the online store if the fibarc I am considering is the color of or would blend with a line I know- even if you haven't bought fibarc in a while-go to the brick and mortar find fibarc(s) from a well known company that has the color you are looking for to use as a comparison. All the info you need is on the end of the bolt. The online has always been able to advise me correctly with this information. Good luck I too think the back fibarc needs to help the entire quilt and is worth putting thought into as you have invested so much effort in the top.

They could not believe people wore such small sizes! Nearly 20 years as part of that family and she still blushes thinking about it.Miss Katy, hope all perks up at your house and that you take it easy.
